argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | symgga.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` X ) |
| 2 |  | symgga.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | symgga.f | |- F = ( f e. B , x e. X |-> ( f ` x ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( X e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_idghm | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( _I |` B ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvresi | |- ( f e. B -> ( ( _I |` B ) ` f ) = f ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( f e. B /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( _I |` B ) ` f ) = f ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( f e. B /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( ( _I |` B ) ` f ) ` x ) = ( f ` x ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_mpt2eq3ia | |- ( f e. B , x e. X |-> ( ( ( _I |` B ) ` f ) ` x ) ) = ( f e. B , x e. X |-> ( f ` x ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqtr4i | |- F = ( f e. B , x e. X |-> ( ( ( _I |` B ) ` f ) ` x ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 1, 10 | #P_lactghmga | |- ( ( _I |` B ) e. ( G GrpHom G ) -> F e. ( G GrpAct X ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 5, 11 | #P_3syl | |- ( X e. V -> F e. ( G GrpAct X ) ) |
